review: I liked the size and performance of the stick
author: User

review: Movies  are  posted  BUT  are  not available.
author: Rene V.

review: This is the best thing ever. At first I was like eh. Then I was like wow. Netflix and Prime videos loads pretty fast! Loved it so much I bought another one! One in the living room and one in my bed room
author: Jack

review: Very disappointed,  when I had roku I had many free shows but almost everything I tried to watch I had to pay for. The reason I bought this was to enjoy some old shows and movies that were free like I had before with roku. It will cost me way more to continue with the fire tv stick than to just add more to my cable bill. I was hoping to really enjoy this.
author: Arline Bailey

review: I can not believe what this fire stick can do works great and set up very easy
author: Rudy Gibis Jr

review: It does exactly what it says it will do. A great source of entertainment.
author: Michael W.
